subject: for some reason there was a bubble machine
body: i'm thankful that during the doctor's appointment where we decide to try doubling the lamictal, a friend got some good news, and we met at the rooftop bar across the street from the doctor's office for a drink in the sunshine and for some reason there was a bubble machine and so many bubbles floating all around us in the warm air.
normalized_markdown: i'm thankful that during the doctor's appointment where we decide to try doubling the lamictal, a friend got some good news, and we met at the rooftop bar across the street from the doctor's office for a drink in the sunshine and for some reason there was a bubble machine and so many bubbles floating all around us in the warm air.
